page.title: 16PLAYGROUND GAMES OF THE 80's
page.content: {SKILLY}is another game requiring equal teams. Whilst one team runs off the other counts to one hundred and then chases after the first team and attempts to touch each person. If caught, the person must stand with one hand against the wall. If a member of the team who hasn't been caught can touch the wall and shout{'Skilly'}all those caught are immediately free. The game continues until all of one team are caught. Other games we play are,{Hopscotch, {Tick, Hide-and-Seek, Farmer Farmer, {Singing Games, Skipping Games, Ball {Games}and{Chanting}and{Clapping Games. There are also seasonal games like {Conkers}and{Marbles.
